bio: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy. He's passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. With experience in traditional and non-traditional education, he advocates for impactful and inclusive internet. yeehaa has been involved in various tech and education initiatives, including the Dutch Internet Society and Public Spaces Coalition. Currently based in Taipei, he focuses on bringing people together around common values and creating effective ecosystems.
